text: Well I waited for an appointment for about 3 weeks. My appointment was 2 pm and I waited on the phone for 45 minutes.every 10 minutes the receptionist will come on and excuse the lawyer for the tardiness. I kept on waiting until she offered that they would call me back. But I couldn't do the times or the l can give you an appointment 2 days later l said no l wait. Then someone else came on the phone and said the lawyer is not able to take you. And we do not have appointments until November a month later. I said I would wait because I'm not going to lose my time and wait for another mother. Then she said l can refund your payment. I did not ask for a refund I said I just wanted my appointment. Well nothing they could do. I didn't like the service because one person tells me I will give you an appointment 2 days later the other person no we don't have anything until a later month. I guess the lawyers are so busy that the receptionists are able to turn clients down or the lawyers do not know the work that the receptionists are doing. Not a good experience. I wanted to work with them because they come on the radio Radio America but I guess my time and my money ğŸ’° are not good. But there are more immigration lawyers out there. ğŸ˜”
